name: data.world & Redshift Connector
description: Pulls data from a redshift database and pushes it to a data.world dataset

DW_DATASET_OWNER.description: Owner of the data.world dataset. Could be a member or an organization

DW_DATASET_ID.description: ID of the data.world dataset. Format: dataset-id

REDSHIFT_PORT.description: Port used to access the Redshift cluster

REDSHIFT_USER.description: User authorized to access the Redshift cluster
